text: Ralph Therrio (born January 12, 1954) is an American former cyclist. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics and 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of the United States Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:American track cyclists
title: Ralph Therrio
